meanings.definition: An additional tax on something already taxed.
meanings.sent1: The surtaxes on our income made it hard to save money.
meanings.sent2: The government introduced surtaxes on luxury goods.
meanings.sent3: Paying surtaxes felt like adding insult to injury.
meanings.sent4: The surtaxes weighed heavily on the citizens' finances.
meanings.sent5: The surtaxes were like a financial double whammy.

meanings.definition: To impose an additional tax on something.
meanings.sent1: The government decided to surtaxes imported goods.
meanings.sent2: Businesses may surtaxes certain products to cover costs.
meanings.sent3: I will surtaxes my siblings if they don't clean up their mess.
meanings.sent4: She surtaxes her time with extra work to help others.
meanings.sent5: The chef will surtaxes the dish with a sprinkle of truffle oil.

meanings.definition: The act of levying an extra tax on something.
meanings.sent1: The surtaxes on fuel prices affected everyone's budget.
meanings.sent2: The city council discussed the implementation of surtaxes.
meanings.sent3: The surtaxes announcement caused a stir among the population.
meanings.sent4: The surtaxes were like a financial burden on the citizens.
meanings.sent5: The surtaxes were a necessary evil to fund public projects.
